item.title: MUVERA - Google's FDE approach for speeding up multi-vector retrieval
item.description: Scale search with MUVERA: Google's FDE approach cuts latency 18x while W&B observability ensures reliable, trackable experiments.

item.title: Using Google's Agent Development Kit and Agent2Agent
item.description: Discover the Agent2Agent (A2A) open protocol for AI interoperability. Learn A2A principles & build a multi-agent system using Google's ADK in our tutorial.

item.title: Deep reinforcement learning: Integrating neural networks with RL
item.description: Explore how deep reinforcement learning combines neural networks and RL to enable agents to learn optimal strategies from raw data across gaming and robotics.

item.title: Supervised learning vs deep learning vs reinforcement learning
item.description: Supervised vs deep vs reinforcement learning explained. See how AI uses labels, networks & rewards to learn, plus deep reinforcement learning examples.

item.title: LLMs are machine learning classifiers
item.description: Learn how to use LLMs like GPT for text classification. Explore prompting, fine-tuning, and when to choose LLMs over traditional machine learning classifiers.

item.title: RAG techniques: From naive to advanced
item.description: Explore various RAG techniques, from basic to advanced, and discover how chunking, indexing, and query transformation can elevate your AI's performance in complex use cases.

item.title: AI and regulatory compliance in finance
item.description: Explore regulatory compliance in finance, types of regulations, risks of non-compliance through real-world examples, and the role of technology and AI in safeguarding the financial world.

item.title: What is model risk management in finance?
item.description: This guide covers why Model Risk Management (MRM) is important to ensure financial models are accurate and safe, and provides tips for managing model risks effectively.

item.title: Building a Q&A Bot for Weights & Biases
item.description: In this article, we explore how to utilize OpenAI's ChatGPT and LangChain to build a Question-Answering bot for Weights & Biases' podcast series, Gradient Dissent.

item.title: BLIP-2: A new Visual Language Model by Salesforce
item.description: In this article, we'll explore BLIP-2, a new Vision Language Model by Salesforce which beats the previous state-of-the-art Flamingo on various multimodal tasks.

item.title: Is PyTorch 2.0 Faster Than PyTorch 1.13?
item.description: In this article, we make a comparison between the current stable version of PyTorch 1.13 with the latest announced PyTorch 2.0 to see which performs better.

item.title: SetFit: Efficient Few-Shot Learning Without Prompts
item.description: Publish your model insights with interactive plots for performance metrics, predictions, and hyperparameters. Made by Atharva Ingle using Weights & Biases

item.title: DeepMind Flamingo: A Visual Language Model for Few-Shot Learning
item.description: In this article, we'll explore Flamingo — an open-ended single visual language model (VLM) for multimodal machine learning research developed by DeepMind.

item.title: Hugging Face Accelerate Super Charged With Weights & Biases
item.description: In this article, we'll walk through how to use Hugging Face Accelerate with W&B, demonstrating how easy it is to perform distributed training and evaluation.

item.title: 3D Segmentation with MONAI and PyTorch Supercharged by Weights & Biases
item.description: A tutorial on how to use Weights & Biases with MONAI and PyTorch to accelerate your medical research. Made by Atharva Ingle using Weights & Biases
